sources.title: Black Tuesday (1954)
sources.description: Edward G. Robinson, Jean Parker, Milburn Stone, Peter Graves, Warren Stevens, Jack Kelly, Russell Johnson

sources.title: Black Tuesday (1954)
sources.description: Vicious gangster Vincent Canelli pulls off a daring prison escape just moments before going to the electric chair, taking with him Peter Manning – a bank robber and cop killer who was to die right after him.  Taking several hostages along, they try to get their hands on the loot from Manning’s robbery to finance their escape from the country. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/black-tuesday-1954/

metadata.Plot: Vicious gangster Vincent Canelli pulls off a daring prison escape just moments before going to the electric chair, taking with him Peter Manning - a bank robber and cop killer who was to die right after him. Taking several hostages along, they try to get their hands on the loot from Manning's robbery to finance their escape from the country.
metadata.Actors: Edward G. Robinson, Jean Parker, Peter Graves
